title: Principles of American Democracy
description: This section covers the foundation of American government, the Constitution, and the democratic form of government.

title: System of Government
description: This section covers the organization of the U.S. government, and the powers of the branches of government.

title: Rights and Responsibilities
description: This section covers the rights and responsibilities of U.S. citizens and residents.

title: Colonial Period and Independence
description: This section covers early American history, from the colonial period to independence.

title: 1800s
description: This section covers American history during the 1800s, including the Civil War and important historical figures.

title: Recent American History and Other Important Historical Information
description: This section covers more recent American history and other important historical information.

title: Geography
description: This section covers basic U.S. geography.

title: Symbols
description: This section covers symbols of the United States.
